column6:
"GOLDEN AGE" PART 3 (OF 4),2004,12
The epic Daredevil anniversary storyline continues, traversing three different eras in Daredevil's life. As Matt Murdock's past catches up with him, the original Kingpin is there to deal the punishment! Featuring stunning artwork by Alex Maleev in a style you've never seen before!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Dave Stewart
